subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Sam Thompson scored a career-high 18 points Saturday, and No. 7 Ohio State made the most of an opportunity to get out and run, beating U.N.C. Asheville, 90-72.
snippet: Sam Thompson scored a career-high 18 points Saturday, and No. 7 Ohio State made the most of an opportunity to get out and run, beating U.N.C. Asheville, 90-72.
